name: Adduction Machine
description: Hip adduction machine focusing on inner thigh (adductors).

name: Bench Press
description: Classic barbell chest exercise. Focus on chest, triceps, and front shoulders.

name: Bench Press (Dumbbell)
description: Bench press using dumbbells. Promotes balanced chest activation and stability.

name: Bench Press (Smith Machine)
description: Smith machine bench press with a guided bar path for chest, triceps, and shoulders.

name: Biceps Curl (Dumbbell)
description: Classic dumbbell curl for biceps development.

name: Butterfly (Cables)
description: Cable fly (standing or lying) for chest isolation.

name: Butterfly (Machine)
description: Pec deck machine fly for chest isolation.

name: Cable Cross
description: Cable exercise for chest definition. Adjustable angles for variation.

name: Cable Rotation
description: Standing cable trunk rotation. Focus on obliques and overall core control.

name: Cable Twist
description: Standing cable trunk rotation. Focus on obliques and overall core control.

name: Calf Raises (Standing Machine)
description: Standing calf raises at the machine. Focus on the gastrocnemius.

name: Calf Raises (Seated)
description: Seated calf raise. Focus on the soleus muscle.

name: Concentration Curls
description: One-arm biceps curl. Focuses on peak contraction and isolation.

name: Crunches (Cable)
description: Kneeling cable crunch for weighted ab work.

name: Crunches (Machine)
description: Abdominal crunch machine for controlled core training.

name: Deadlift
description: Fundamental back and leg exercise. Keep bar close and spine neutral.

name: Dips
description: Bodyweight or assisted dips for chest and triceps.

name: Hammer Curls
description: Biceps exercise with neutral grip. Targets the brachialis.

name: Hex Squat
description: Machine-guided squat variation. Focuses on quadriceps activation.

name: Incline Bench Press
description: Performed on an incline bench. Emphasizes upper chest and shoulders.

name: Incline Bench Press (Dumbbell)
description: Variation with dumbbells for greater range of motion and stabilization.

name: Incline Bench Press (Smith Machine)
description: Smith machine incline bench press emphasizing upper chest and shoulders.

name: Lat Pulldown
description: Pull-down movement targeting the lats. Grip variations shift muscle focus.

name: Lateral Neck Flexion
description: Side-to-side neck flexion. Use light resistance and slow tempo.

name: Lateral Raise (Dumbbell)
description: Classic shoulder exercise with dumbbells for lateral delts.

name: Lateral Raise (Machine)
description: Isolation exercise for side delts using a machine.

name: Lateral Raises (Cables)
description: Cable lateral raises for constant tension on lateral delts.

name: Leg Curls
description: Machine hamstring curl. Isolates the hamstrings.

name: Leg Extension
description: Machine quad extension. Isolates the quadriceps.

name: Neck Curls
description: Neck flexion against resistance. Keep range controlled and avoid jerking.

name: Neck Extension
description: Neck extension against resistance to strengthen posterior neck.
muscles: Neck Extensors (Upper Traps, Splenius, Erector Cervicis)

name: Overhead Press
description: Press barbell overhead. Focus on shoulder strength and core stability.

name: Preacher Curls (Machine)
description: Machine-supported preacher curl emphasizing controlled biceps isolation.

name: Pull-Ups
description: Bodyweight pull-ups targeting lats and biceps.

name: Pull-Ups (Machine)
description: Assisted pull-ups targeting back and biceps.

name: Reverse Fly
description: Reverse fly motion. Focus on rear delts and upper back.

name: Rope Skipping
description: Jump-rope cardio to build endurance and coordination; keep a steady rhythm and soft landings.

name: Reverse Wrist Curls (Dumbbell)
description: Seated reverse wrist curls with dumbbells to target forearm extensors.

name: Shoulder Press (Machine)
description: Machine-guided pressing movement for front and side delts.

name: Shrugs (Dumbbell)
description: Dumbbell shrugs targeting the upper trapezius.

name: Shrugs (Machine)
description: Machine-assisted shrugs for upper traps.

name: Squat
description: Fundamental leg and glute exercise. Keep depth and neutral spine.

name: T-Bar Row
description: Row variation with T-bar. Targets upper back and rear delts.

name: Tricep Extension (Machine)
description: Machine-guided triceps extension for stable, isolated elbow extension.

name: Tricep Extension (Rope, Isolated)
description: Cable rope triceps extension with strict form and end-range flare for isolation.

name: Triceps Pushdown
description: Triceps exercise at the cable machine. Can use bar or rope.

name: Wrist Curls (Dumbbell)
description: Seated wrist curls with dumbbells to target forearm flexors.
